betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The LV Machine Hull will be your gate in making Low Voltage Machines.
§6
All LV Machines and generators will consume/produce 1 Amp of LV power, Thats 32 Eu/t per generator.

Machine Recipes sometimes don't use 32 Eu/T but will still need 1 amp to charge.
§f
Making a machine hull and i'll unlock the 3 Chapter LV (Low Voltage)

If your having trouble with the next quest Basic LV Components, Understanding GregTech Energy is in the Generating Power Chapter.
